resources.string: Let\'s reduce the use of paper by using this app!
Data must match and cannot be empty
Name must match and cannot be blank
Image of Ahlan Wa Sahlan Laundry

The Ahlan Wa Sahlan Laundry App is an app created for the owners and caretakers of the Ahlan Wa Sahalan Laundry. This app makes it easier for the caretaker of Ahlan Wa Sahlan Laundry to notify customers that their laundry is done. The app was also created so that the owner of Ahlan Wa Sahlan Laundry does not need to provide paper invoices, so it can be environmentally friendly.
